page.title: First Orion UI Documentation
page.description: Find all the information you need to get started with First Orion UI.

tabs.name: Examples
tabs.description: A collection of examples demonstrating the usage of First Orion UI components.

children.name: Accordion Example
children.description: This is an example of an accordion component. It allows you to expand and collapse sections of content.

componentData.name: Accordion
componentData.description: An accordion component that allows for expandable and collapsible sections.

props.name: primary
props.description: If true, the accordion will be primary color.

children.name: Counter Example - Advanced
children.description: This is an example of a counter component. It allows you to increment and decrement a value.

componentData.name: Counter
componentData.description: A simple counter component that allows you to increment and decrement a value.

props.name: primary
props.description: If true, the counter will be primary color.

children.name: Counter Example - Basic
children.description: This example demonstrates a simple counter application using the First Orion UI framework. It showcases the basic functionality of incrementing and decrementing a counter value.

componentData.name: Counter
componentData.description: A simple counter component that allows you to increment and decrement a value.

props.name: primary
props.description: If true, the counter will be primary color.

tabs.name: Getting Started
tabs.description: Get started with First Orion UI by exploring the documentation, examples, and API references. This section provides a comprehensive guide to help you understand the framework and its components.
